name: MG Parallax Slider
author: Mahesh Waghmare

sections.description:
Create parallax slider for your website. It provide ultimate admin panel for slide customization.
Note: I use google drive for background images. So, If you are offline then background images form option panel “Background” are empty. These does not show pattern images. (This is for minimize plugin .zip)

How to Use
You can create slides using two ways.

  1. Use Framework Unlimited Slides: Goto MGPS Options -> Slides -> Add Slides and use shortcode [mgps-slider]
  2. OR
  3. Use MG Slider: Goto MG Slider -> Add New and use shortcode [mgps-slider-post]
  4. Use MG Options for styling slider background, title, content etc.

Features:

  • Ultimate admin panel
  • 2 Shortcodes [mgps-slider] and [mgps-slider-post]
  • Unlimited Slides
  • Unlimited Colors
  • 19 Background Patterns
  • 600+ Google Fonts
  • Import/Export

Coming soon:

  • Custom Slider Background Image uploaded

Review:

Reply your Reviews, Suggestions to make it more useful…

TIPS:

Reply your Reviews, Suggestions to make it more useful…

Donations
sections.installation:
1. Upload mg-parallax-slider to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
  3. Create slides using
  4. Framework Unlimited Slides: Goto MGPS Options -> Slides -> Add Slides and use shortcode [mgps-slider]
  5. OR
  6. MG Slider: Goto MG Slider -> Add New and use shortcode [mgps-slider-post]
  7. Use MG Options for styling slider background, title, content etc.
sections.changelog:
June 30

  • Fix = print JS code by adding mgps_hook_js
  • Add = support for arrow & bullets
  • Add = google drive for images
